top_comments_top.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.
Lpt If you ever plan on murdering a hitchhiker, put a fake license plate on first.

If i was kind enough to give a ride to a stranger and they whip out their phone and start taking pics of my car and license plate I would drive away lol. That would seem super sketchy to me. The pro tip would be to never use a stranger as a ride. Friends, family, cabs, uber. No reason to ask a stranger, nevermind asking one abd start taking pics of their belongings

When I was 16 (a long time ago!) I used to hitchhike. One guy that gave me a lift started going the opposite way and I freaked out. He was actually just taking a shortcut but at that moment I realized how incredibly fucking stupid I was for getting in a strangers car. Never did it again.
First, by giving a ride I'm already taking a risk of being robbed by the hitchhiker. Then the person starts taking pictures of my vehicle? Nope. Get out and walk, your suspiciously acting stranger.
